resources.string: How can I turn my alarm on or off?
How can I add my remainder?
How can I update or delete my remainder?
How do I share my app to others?

string-array.name: string_array_on_off
string-array.item: Click on the switch button to turn on and off an alarm.

string-array.name: string_array_remainder
string-array.item: Click on the "+" button at the bottom of the screen to add an remainder.It will show you two buttons of priority you want
Type the title of your remainder at alarm field.
Type the information or description about your remainder in the description field to set your remainder description.
Pick the date you want to set alarm from the calender icon.
Pick the time you want to set the alarm from the watch icon.
Click save and you are good to go. Your alarm is set.
Hide priority again click on the "+" button

string-array.name: string_array_priority
string-array.item: In low priority by default only vibration is selected
In high priority both ring and vibration is selected
Click Low button to show low priority
Click High button to show high priority

string-array.name: string_array_update_delete
string-array.item: Swipe from right to left on your remainder to get the update or delete option.

string-array.name: string_array_transfer
string-array.item: Click the share button to share your app with others.
